class NotifyChannels:
    """Core NotifyMSTeam Class.
    Usage:
    from NotifyChannels import webhook
    Send Messages to webhook url"""

    def __init__(self, channel: str) -> str:
        self.webhook = self.webhook["channel"]["uri"]
        return self.webhook
